strata=rural
strata=city
age
treatment=A
treatment=B
ddply(data.c, .(strata), function(x) t.test(age~treatment, data=x, na.rm=TRUE)

factor(data$strata)
factor(data$treatment)
dlply(data.c, .(strata), function(x) t.test(age~treatment, data=x, na.rm=TRUE
